General.Name: Hubei Zhongyi Science Technology Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Hubei Zhongyi Technology Inc. engages in research, development, production, and sale of electronic materials. It offers copper foil products for lithium-ion batteries and printed circuit boards. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Xiaogan, China.
General.Address: No.47 Mengze Avenue South, Xiaogan, China, 432500
